about.title: About Eager Plumbing LLC
about.description: At Eager Plumbing LLC, we are dedicated to providing top-notch plumbing services in Kerrville, TX, and the surrounding Hill Country region. With years of experience in both new construction and remodel plumbing, our mission is to ensure your plumbing needs are met with the utmost professionalism and care. Our team is committed to delivering quality service that you can trust, whether it's a minor repair or a major installation. We pride ourselves on our reliability, transparency, and customer satisfaction.

services.title: Our Plumbing Services
services.subtitle: Full-service plumbing solutions for your needs

items.title: Emergency Plumbing Repairs
items.description: We provide 24/7 emergency plumbing services to address any urgent issues. Our experienced plumbers are ready to tackle leaks, clogs, and more.

items.title: Water Heater Installation
items.description: Expert installation of all types of water heaters, ensuring you have reliable hot water when you need it.

items.title: Drain Cleaning Services
items.description: Professional drain cleaning services to prevent clogs and ensure smooth drainage in your home.

items.title: Plumbing Maintenance
items.description: Regular maintenance checks to keep your plumbing system in top condition and prevent costly repairs.

items.title: Full-Service Plumbing
items.description: We handle everything from new construction to remodel plumbing, ensuring all your needs are met.

items.title: 24/7 Availability
items.description: Our team is available around the clock to tackle any plumbing emergencies that arise.

items.title: Trusted Professionals
items.description: Our licensed and insured plumbers have extensive experience and a proven track record in the Hill Country.

items.title: Transparent Pricing
items.description: We provide upfront estimates with no hidden fees so you can trust what you pay for.

items.title: Community Focused
items.description: As a local business, we prioritize our community and deliver personalized service that sets us apart.

items.title: Customer Satisfaction
items.description: We strive for excellence in every job, ensuring our customers are not just satisfied but delighted with our work.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied customers

items.reviewText: Eager plumbing is amazing! I called and they were able to install a new water heater at my home. The price and service can’t be beat. Very friendly and experienced staff! Will definitely use again...

Excellent experience from start to finish. The plumber was on time, polite, and clearly experienced. They explained everything clearly and got the job done. I felt confident in their work and will definitely use them again.
Well done replaced washer valves and fixed toilet tank gasket while here. Saving call out charges plus senior savings. Super qualified workers with an organized truck.
Guys were on time, fixed the problem very quickly. Very professional and friendly. I got a senior discount without even asking. Highly recommend this company.
The men arrived right on time. Very pleasant, polite and efficient. Got the job done quickly. Couldn’t ask for more! Thank you Eager Plumbing!

contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us today. We're here to help with all your needs.

footer.privacyPolicyText:
Privacy Policy

Effective date: October 8, 2025

Controller: Eager Plumbing LLC, 418 Clay St, Kerrville, TX 78028, US · Email: privacy@eagerplumbingtx.com

This policy explains what data is collected, how it is used and shared, and the rights available under applicable laws such as GDPR and CCPA/CPRA.

Scope

This policy applies to the website and mobile applications operated by Eager Plumbing LLC and related services provided globally.

Data We Collect

  • Account data: name, email, username, password (hashed).
  • Usage data: IP address, device and browser, pages viewed, timestamps.
  • Transaction data: orders, billing details, limited payment metadata via processor.
  • Marketing preferences: subscriptions and communication settings.
  • Cookies/trackers: identifiers for analytics, functionality, and ads where applicable.

Data is collected directly, automatically through the service, and from service providers as described below.

Purposes and Legal Bases

  • Provide and maintain services (Contract).
  • Security, fraud prevention, and debugging (Legitimate interests).
  • Compliance with legal obligations (Legal obligation).
  • Analytics and improvement (Legitimate interests or Consent, depending on jurisdiction).
  • Marketing communications (Consent, with opt-out options).

How We Process

Data is processed via forms, account features, automatic logs, cookies, and third-party processors (e.g., payments, analytics, hosting, email delivery).

No automated decision-making or profiling with legal effects is performed unless stated otherwise.

Sharing and Disclosures

  • Payment processors to process transactions.
  • Analytics providers to measure and improve performance.
  • Cloud hosting and storage vendors to deliver the service.
  • Email service providers for transactional and marketing emails.

Disclosures may occur for legal compliance, to protect rights and safety, or during business transfers.

Your Rights

Depending on location, rights may include access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, objection, and the right to withdraw consent.

To exercise rights, send a request to privacy@eagerplumbingtx.com. Reasonable identity verification may be required. Responses are provided within the timeframes set by law.

Data Retention

  • Account data is retained for the life of the account and a reasonable period thereafter.
  • Transaction records are retained for statutory periods (for example, up to 7 years).
  • Usage and cookie data is retained per cookie lifetimes or aggregated/anonymized.

Security

Measures include TLS encryption in transit, access controls, monitoring and logging, and vendor due diligence including DPAs where required.

No method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and residual risk cannot be eliminated.

Cookies and Tracking

Types include strictly necessary, functional, analytics, and advertising cookies. Non-essential cookies may require consent depending on jurisdiction.

Preferences can be managed via the cookie banner or browser settings, and can be changed at any time.

International Transfers

Where data is transferred internationally, appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions are used.

Children’s Privacy

The service is not directed to children below applicable age thresholds, and data is not knowingly collected from them.

Changes to This Policy

Material changes will be posted with an updated effective date, and additional notice may be provided where required.

Contact

Questions or requests: privacy@eagerplumbingtx.com. Individuals may have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority in their jurisdiction.

Jurisdictional Notices

GDPR (EEA/UK)

  • Lawful bases are listed above; data subjects have the rights listed in the Rights section.
  • Transfers outside the EEA/UK rely on appropriate safeguards such as SCCs or adequacy decisions.

California (CCPA/CPRA)

  • California residents have rights to know, delete, correct, and opt out of sale or sharing of personal information.
  • Two or more methods will be provided to submit requests; an opt-out mechanism is available for targeted advertising where applicable.
90 2025 Eager Plumbing LLC
